querystring.select: SELECT re1.EMP_NAME AS SalesOfficerNo, a.SALES_NOTES AS SalesNotes, re2.EMP_NAME AS SalesHeadNo, MC.DESCR AS SalesRecommendCode
querystring.from: FROM dbo.APP a WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN FOUNDATION.dbo.REF_MASTER MC WITH(NOLOCK)  ON a.MR_SALES_RECOMMEND_CODE = MC.MASTER_CODE JOIN FOUNDATION.dbo.REF_EMP re1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON a.SALES_OFFICER_NO = re1.EMP_NO JOIN FOUNDATION.dbo.REF_EMP re2 WITH(NOLOCK) ON a.SALES_HEAD_NO = re2.EMP_NO

querystring.select: SELECT RAS.APP_SRC_NAME AS AppSourceCode, RM3.DESCR AS FirstInstTypeCode, a.TENOR AS Tenor, RM5.DESCR AS InterestType, RM1.DESCR AS PayFreqCode, a.NUM_OF_INST AS NumOfInst, RM2.DESCR AS InstSchemeCode, a.MR_CUST_NOTIFY_OPT_CODE AS CustNotifyOptCode, RM4.DESCR AS WopCode, a.FLOATING_PERIOD_CODE AS FloatingPeriodCode, MC.MOU_CUST_NO AS MouNo,a.NUM_OF_INST AS NoInstallment, RM6.DESCR AS InstallmentType, RM7.DESCR AS TopType, RM8.DESCR AS CalcMethod, AF.TOP_DAYS AS TermOfPayment,AF.IS_DISCLOSED AS Disclosed, RM9.DESCR AS PaidBy,RM10.DESCR AS RecourseType
querystring.from: FROM dbo.APP a WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN dbo.APP_FIN_DATA afd WITH(NOLOCK) on a.APP_ID = afd.APP_ID JOIN FOUNDATION.dbo.REF_MASTER RM1 WITH(NOLOCK)  ON a.PAY_FREQ_CODE = RM1.MASTER_CODE JOIN FOUNDATION.dbo.REF_MASTER RM2 WITH(NOLOCK)  ON afd.MR_INST_SCHEME_CODE = RM2.MASTER_CODE JOIN FOUNDATION.dbo.REF_MASTER RM3 WITH(NOLOCK)  ON a.MR_FIRST_INST_TYPE_CODE = RM3.MASTER_CODE JOIN FOUNDATION.dbo.REF_MASTER RM4 WITH(NOLOCK)  ON a.MR_WOP_CODE = RM4.MASTER_CODE JOIN FOUNDATION.dbo.REF_MASTER RM5 WITH(NOLOCK)  ON afd.INTEREST_TYPE = RM5.MASTER_CODE JOIN dbo.REF_APP_SRC RAS WITH (NOLOCK) ON a.MR_APP_SOURCE_CODE = RAS.APP_SRC_CODE JOIN dbo.MOU_CUST MC WITH(NOLOCK) ON a.MOU_CUST_ID = MC.MOU_CUST_ID JOIN dbo.APP_FCTR AF WITH(NOLOCK) ON a.APP_ID = AF.APP_ID JOIN FOUNDATION.dbo.REF_MASTER RM6 WITH(NOLOCK) ON AF.MR_INST_TYPE_CODE = RM6.MASTER_CODE JOIN FOUNDATION.dbo.REF_MASTER RM7 WITH(NOLOCK) ON AF.TOP_BASED = RM7.MASTER_CODE JOIN FOUNDATION.dbo.REF_MASTER RM8 WITH(NOLOCK) ON AF.MR_SINGLE_INST_CALC_MTHD_CODE = RM8.MASTER_CODE JOIN FOUNDATION.dbo.REF_MASTER RM9 WITH(NOLOCK) ON AF.PAID_BY = RM9.MASTER_CODE JOIN FOUNDATION.dbo.REF_MASTER RM10 WITH(NOLOCK) ON AF.RECOURSE_TYPE = RM10.MASTER_CODE
querystring.where: WHERE a.APP_ID = {0} AND RM3.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'FIRST_INST_TYPE' AND RM4.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'WOP' AND RM5.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'INTEREST_INPUT_TYPE' AND RM6.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'INST_TYPE' AND RM8.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'SINGLE_INST_CALC_METHOD' AND RM9.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'APP_PAID_BY'
